title: Electric potential E is quadratic function of x

content.question: The electric field along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis varies with position <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> according to the equation <math alttext="vector E of x equals, a times, open parenthesis, 3 x squared minus x, close parenthesis, i hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mover accent="true"><mi>E</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></math>, where <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math> is a positive constant. Taking the electric potential to be zero at <math alttext="x equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, which expression is equal to the electric potential as a function of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="6 a x minus a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></math>
<math alttext="negative 6 a x plus a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi></math>

<math alttext="a x cubed minus the fraction with numerator a x squared, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="negative a x cubed plus the fraction with numerator a x squared, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative a x cubed plus the fraction with numerator a x squared, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
